what: About the Green Bond Transparency datasets:
title: Getting Started
text: Green Bond Transparency(GBTP) developed free public integrated dataset bond’s information included platform presented five export-files. gbtransparency helps users access files. files : bond's general information allocation proceeds project categories using international standards (GBP, CBI) measurements impact outcome KPIs individual bond-tranche information detailed information projects receiving disbursements. also additional file named index. shows description variable names per data.

title: Getting Started
text: gbtransparency still heavy development: Please use accordingly. initial phase package development aims finalize stable versions datasets, announced new package version release note. development focus building helper functions aid efficient analysis workflows dataset. gbtransparency personal project: package author works consultant AidData package personal project. author built package use, hopes can grow robust package can aid researchers, policymakers, others interested gaining actionable, empirically-based insights Green Bond Transparency datasets.

title: Getting Started
text: can install development version gbtransparency GitHub : package likely never published CRAN data file sizes big.
code: # install the `devtools` package if not yet installed # install.packages("devtools")  # install chinadevfin2 from GitHub devtools::install_github("Teal-Insights/gbtransparency")

title: Getting Started
text: datasets packages follow: Now can look first six observations per data gbt_allocations: allocation proceeds project categories using international standards (GBP, CBI) gbt_bonds: bond’s general information gbt_key_performance_indicators: measurements impact outcome KPIs gbt_projects: detailed information projects receiving disbursements gbt_tranches: individual bond-tranche information gbt_data_dictionary: index (description variable names per data.)
code: utils::head(x = gbt_allocations) %>% knitr::kable() utils::head(x = gbt_bonds) %>% knitr::kable() utils::head(x = gbt_key_performance_indicators) %>% knitr::kable() utils::head(x = gbt_projects) %>% knitr::kable() utils::head(x = gbt_tranches) %>% knitr::kable() utils::head(x = gbt_data_dictionary) %>% knitr::kable()

title: Authors and Citation
text: Teal Emery. Author. Reuben Opondo. Maintainer.

what: Green Bond Transparency - Data by Allocations. — gbt_allocations
title: Green Bond Transparency - Data by Allocations. — gbt_allocations
text: Description variables `gbt_allocations` tibble

title: Green Bond Transparency - Data by Allocations. — gbt_allocations
Green Bond Transparency - Data by Allocations. — gbt_allocations
text: tibble 2278 observations 17 variables: bond_handle Unique code bond registrered Green Bond Transparency Platform showed bond link. bond_name Name bond paltform created issuer. nomenclature Standard/taxonomy: used define project categories: Climate Bonds Initiative Project Classification, ICMA Green Bonds Principles Project Categories, EU Taxonomy Green Bonds, ISO Standard. category Project category especified project category standard. subcategory Project sub-category especified project category standard. project Project name. location Location project. latitude Latitude plane coordinates. longitude Longitude plane coordinates. date_allocation mm/dd/yyyy proceeds allocated/ assigned project. date_disbursement mm/dd/yyyy proceeds disbursed project. allocation_currency currency used allocate proceeds bond project. allocated_allocation_currency Allocated amount project reported allocation currency. disbursed_allocation_currency Disbursed amount project reported allocation currency. bond_currency denominated currency bond. disbursed_bond_currency Disbursed amount project reported bond currency. disbursed_usd USD equivalent disbursed amount. refinancing Indicated project refinanced. cofinancing_percentage Share total value project co-finance using bond proceeds.

what: Green Bond Transparency - Data by Bonds. — gbt_bonds
title: Green Bond Transparency - Data by Bonds. — gbt_bonds
text: Description variables `gbt_bonds` tibble

title: Green Bond Transparency - Data by Bonds. — gbt_bonds
Green Bond Transparency - Data by Bonds. — gbt_bonds
text: tibble 177 observations 17 variables: link Unique link bond data Green Bond Transparency Platform website. handle Unique code bond registrered Green Bond Transparency Platform showed bond link. ISIN International Securities Identification Number (ISIN) uniquely identifies  security. CUSIP CUSIP number unique identification number assigned stocks registered bonds United States Canada. FIGI FIGI code global identification based Bloomberg’s Open Symbology. ticker stock symbol arrangement characters—usually letters—representing publicly-traded securities exchange name Name bond platform created issuer. issuer_name Name issuer reporting use proceeds KPIs bond issuer_type Type issuer categories: Development bank, Financial corporate, Non-financial corporate, Local Government, Sovereign. issuer_jurisdiction Country SPV issuer reporting. fund Indicates one entries "fund-structure". "f" means entry fund strucuture used base group bonds reporting allocations KPIs program level. "t" means entry fund-structure. issuance_date mm/dd/yyyy bond issued. maturity_date mm/dd/yyyy bond matures. Moment time principal bond must repaid investor. volume_usd USD equivalent face value issued. volume_bond_currency Amount issued denominated currency. bond_currency denominated currency bond.

text: tibble 4820 observations 15 variables: bond_handle Unique code bond registrered Green Bond Transparency Platform showed bond link. bond_name Name bond paltform created issuer. nomenclature Standard/taxonomy: used define project categories: Climate Bonds Initiative Project Classification, ICMA Green Bonds Principles Project Categories, EU Taxonomy Green Bonds, ISO Standard. category Project category especified project category standard. subcategory Project sub-category especified project category standard. project Project name. location Location project. latitude Latitude plane coordinates. longitude Longitude plane coordinates. indicator Name key performance indicator. unit International measure unit KPI. planned_value Estimated KPI value project pre-project execution. measured_value Real KPI value project post-project execution. can_be_aggregated Indicates possible aggregate KPI. methodology_code Specific code given methodology used measure KPI. measurement_period_start mm/dd/yyyy ends mesuring KPI period. measurement_period_end mm/dd/yyyy starts mesuring KPI period.
